memberdef.name: XMC_POSIF_CHECK_MODULE_PTR
memberdef.initializer: ( ((PTR)== POSIF0)) /*< Check for valid module pointer */

detaileddescription.para: Defines POSIF input debounce filter configuration.POSIF inputs are connected to low pass filter and this enum is used to configure low pass filters cut off frequency. Use type XMC_POSIF_FILTER_t for this enum. The member defines the low pass filter configuration(LPC) bitfield of PCONF register.
Defines trigger edge in hall sensor mode.Use type XMC_POSIF_HSC_TRIGGER_EDGE_t for this enum. It can be used to configure PCONF register's SPES and MSES bit fields.
Defines active level of an input signal.Use type XMC_POSIF_INPUT_ACTIVE_LEVEL_t for this enum.

Defines POSIF configurable input ports.Use type XMC_POSIF_INPUT_PORT_t for this enum. The member defines the respective input selector(INSELX) bitfields of PCONF register. It selects, which input is used for the phase or Hall input function (depending on the module is set for Quadrature Decoder or Hall Sensor Mode). Same enum can be used to configure pattern update signal select by configuring PCONF register's MSETS bit field.
Hall Mode + MCM Mode : MC Pattern shadow transfer
Quadrature Mode : Quadrature Direction change event
Quadrature Mode : Quadrature period clock generation event

Defines POSIF events.Use type XMC_POSIF_IRQ_EVENT_t for this enum. The member defines available event sources.It is used to configure which event to be used for interrupt generation using PFLGE register. [ PFLG,SPFLG,RPFLG]
Defines POSIF configurable modes.Use type XMC_POSIF_MODE_t for this enum. The members defines the function selector(FSEL) bitfields of PCONF register.
Defines motor rotation direction.Use type XMC_POSIF_QD_DIR_t for this enum. The member defines the direction in quadrature mode.
Never generate the index marker signal
Generate only once after the first revolution
Index marker generated upon every revolution

Defines frequency of index signal generation.Use type XMC_POSIF_QD_INDEX_GENERATION_t for this enum. Member represents available configuration for index marker generation using ICM bit field in QDC register.

Defines position decoder mode selection.Use type XMC_POSIF_QD_MODE_t for this enum. The member defines configuration for the operation of the quadrature decoder mode. It used to configure QDC register.
Defines POSIF service request lines.Use type XMC_POSIF_SR_ID_t for this enum. It used to connect POSIF event to required service request line. in PFLGE register for interrupt generation.
Defines the return status, to verify the POSIF related API calls. Use type XMC_POSIF_STATUS_t for this enum.
Defines POSIF peripheral register structure.Use type XMC_POSIF_t for this data structure.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module
Event to be acknowledged

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Clears event by acknowledgment of peripheral. Acknowledges an IRQ event by configuring 1 to RPFLG register's event bit field.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module of type XMC_POSIF_t

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Asserts the POSIF module into reset and disables the clock. If running on other than XMC45 device then in addition it will gate the peripheral clock. Configures PRCLR0 register's POSIF0RS or POSIF1RS bitfield depends upon peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Disables an IRQ generation capable event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module
Event to be disabled

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Disables event generation of peripheral. Disables an IRQ generation capable event by configuring 0 to PFLGE register's event bit field.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module of type XMC_POSIF_t

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: De-asserts the POSIF module from reset and enables the clock. Configures PRCLR0 register's POSIF0RS or POSIF1RS bit field depends upon peripheral. If running on other than XMC45 device then it will ungate the peripheral clock.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: This is the first API which application must invoke to configure POSIF. It is internally called by XMC_POSIF_Init().

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_POSIF_Disable(),XMC_POSIF_Init()

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module
Event to be enabled

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Enables event generation of peripheral. Enables an IRQ generation capable event by configuring 1 to PFLGE register's event bit field.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module
Event ID to be checked for status
Returns event status

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Returns event status of peripheral. Determines if IRQ event is asserted by retrieving data from PFLG register's event bit field.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_POSIF_SetEvent(),XMC_POSIF_ClearEvent()

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module
Returns current hall sensor pattern. Range : [0-7]

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Returns current sampled hall sensor pattern of peripheral. Retrieves the current hall sensor pattern from HALP register's HCP bit field of peripheral. Applications can at any point in time retrieve the current hall sensor pattern by invoking this API.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: This is applicable only to the hall sensor mode of operation.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_POSIF_HSC_GetLastSampledPattern(),XMC_POSIF_HSC_GetExpectedPattern()

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module
Returns expected hall sensor pattern. Range : [0-7]

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Returns expected hall sensor pattern of peripheral. Retrieves the expected hall sensor pattern from HALP register's HEP bit field of peripheral. Applications can at any point in time retrieve the expected hall sensor pattern by invoking this API.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: This is applicable only to the hall sensor mode of operation.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_POSIF_HSC_GetLastSampledPattern(),XMC_POSIF_HSC_GetCurrentPattern()

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module
Returns last sampled hall sensor pattern. Range : [0-7]

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Returns last sampled hall sensor pattern of peripheral. Retrieves the last sampled hall sensor pattern from PDBG register's HSP bit field of peripheral. Applications can at any point in time retrieve the last sampled hall sensor pattern by invoking this API.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: This is applicable only to the hall sensor mode of operation.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_POSIF_HSC_GetCurrentPattern(),XMC_POSIF_HSC_GetExpectedPattern()

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module
Pointer to hall sensor control initialization data of type XMC_POSIF_HSC_CONFIG_t
Returns XMC_POSIF_STATUS_OK if configured in Hall Sensor Mode else return XMC_POSIF_STATUS_ERROR.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Initializes hall sensor control mode. Configures PCONF register with which POSIF input trigger to be used for sampling hall pattern.Configures PCONF register for idle signal generation for wrong hall event.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: It is necessary to have called XMC_POSIF_Init first with Hall sensor mode before invocation of this API.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module
The hall sensor pattern to be programmed into current pattern [0-7]

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Configures current Hall sensor pattern of peripheral. Configures the Current hall sensor pattern on HALPS shadow register's HCPS bit field of peripheral. Applications can set at any point in time program the current hall sensor pattern by invoking this API.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: This is applicable only to the hall sensor mode of operation. It may be noted that the pattern is merely written to the shadow register. Transfer from the shadow register is based on a hardware transfer trigger or software trigger through API XMC_POSIF_HSC_UpdateHallPattern().

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_POSIF_HSC_GetCurrentPattern(),XMC_POSIF_HSC_SetExpectedPattern()

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module
The hall sensor pattern to be programmed into expected pattern [0-7]

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Configures the expected hall sensor pattern of peripheral. Applications can set at any point in time program the hall sensor expected patterns by invoking this API. Configures the expected hall sensor pattern on HALPS shadow register's HEPS bit field of peripheral.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: This is applicable only to the hall sensor mode of operation.It may be noted that the pattern is merely written to the shadow register. Transfer from the shadow register is based on a hardware transfer trigger or software trigger through API XMC_POSIF_HSC_UpdateHallPattern().

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module
The hall sensor pattern mask [0-63] Format of mask: (expected_pattern << 3) | (current_pattern)

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Configures current and expected hall pattern of peripheral. Configures HALPS register with the Current and Expected hall sensor patterns in one operation. Applications can at any point in time program the current and expected hall sensor pattern by invoking this API.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: This is applicable only to the hall sensor mode of operation. It may be noted that the pattern is merely written to the shadow register. Transfer from the shadow register is based on a hardware transfer trigger or software trigger through API XMC_POSIF_HSC_UpdateHallPattern().

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_POSIF_HSC_SetExpectedPattern(),XMC_POSIF_HSC_SetCurrentPattern()

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Manually performs shadow transfer of hall sensor patterns. Configures MCMS register's STHR bit field with 1. Setting this bit to 1 leads to an immediate update of the fields HALP.HCP(Current pattern) and HALP.HEP(Expected pattern).

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: The transfer of hall sensor pattern shadow registers content to the sensor pattern register happens under two conditions. A hardware trigger starts the shadow transfer. Alternatively, the shadow transfer can be initiated by application software by means of invocation of this API.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module of type XMC_POSIF_t
Pointer to POSIF configuration data(operation mode,input selection and filter configuration)

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Initialize POSIF module with config. Configures POSIF global registers.This is the first API which application must invoke to configure POSIF. It sets up parameters common to all the POSIF modes - hall sensor,quadrature decoder and multi-channel modes of operation. Configures PCONF register with mode of operation,input selection and filter configuration.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_POSIF_HSC_Init(),XMC_POSIF_QD_Init(),XMC_POSIF_MCM_Init()

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module
Returns false: IDLE, true:RUNNING

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Returns the status of POSIF module - Running or IDLE. Retrieves the status from PRUN register's SRB bit.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_POSIF_Start(),XMC_POSIF_Stop()

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Enables update of the Multi-Channel Pattern by software in standalone multi-channel mode. Enabling update of multi-channel pattern happens under two conditions. A hardware trigger enables this update. Alternatively, this can be enabled by software by means of invocation of this API.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: The update is not done immediately due to the fact that the trigger that synchronizes the update with the PWM is still needed.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module
Returns configured multi channel pattern

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Returns configured multi channel pattern of peripheral. Retrieves the Multi-Channel Pattern from MCM register's MCMP bit field of peripheral Applications can at any point in time retrieve the multi-channel pattern by invoking this API.

detaileddescription.para:
peripheral
Pointer to an instance of POSIF module
uint16_t
Returns configured multi channel pattern present in shadow transfer register
Description
Returns configured multi channel pattern in shadow register of peripheral. Retrieves the Multi-Channel Pattern from MCSM shadow register's MCMPS bit field. Applications can at any point in time retrieve the multi-channel pattern by invoking this API.
It can be used when MCM is enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module
Pointer to quadrature decoder initialization data
Returns multi channel pattern initialization status of type XMC_POSIF_STATUS_t

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Initializes multi channel mode in Hall mode, standalone multi-channel mode and quadrature with multi-channel mode. Configures PCONF register with multi channel mode using XMC_POSIF_MCM_CONFIG_t data structure.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: It is necessary to call XMC_POSIF_Init first before invocation of this API. For XMC_POSIF_MODE_HALL_SENSOR, it is necessary to have called XMC_POSIF_HSC_Init before invocation of this API. For XMC_POSIF_MODE_MCM_QD, it is necessary to have called XMC_POSIF_QD_Init before invocation of this API.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_POSIF_Init(),XMC_POSIF_HSC_Init(),XMC_POSIF_QD_Init()

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module
The 16b multi-channel pattern [0-65535]

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Configures MCSM register with Multi-Channel Pattern. This 16b multi-channel pattern which controls the 16 outputs of all slices of a CCU8 module. Transfer from the shadow register is based on a hardware transfer trigger or software trigger through API XMC_POSIF_MCM_UpdateMultiChannelPattern(). Every time that a Multi-Channel pattern transfer is triggered, this value is passed into the field MCM.MCMP of peripheral

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: It may be noted that the pattern is merely written to the shadow register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Performs shadow transfer of the Multi-Channel Pattern register by configuring MCMS register's STMR bit field.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: Transfer multi-channel pattern shadow registers content to the actual pattern register of peripheral. The transfer of multi-channel pattern shadow registers content to the actual pattern register happens under two conditions. A hardware trigger starts the shadow transfer. Alternatively, the shadow transfer can be initiated by application software by means of invocation of this API.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module
Returns the index value.[1 - New rotation started, 0 - In-between]

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Returns the current index value in quadrature decoder mode of peripheral. Retrieves current index signal value of the quadrature decoder from PDBG register's IVAL bit field. Applications can at any point in time retrieve the current index signal value of the quadrature decoder by invoking this API.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: This is applicable only to the quadrature decoder mode of operation.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module
Returns current state of quadrature decoder[Phase B,Phase A]

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Returns the current state of phase signals in quadrature decoder mode of peripheral. Retrieves current state of the quadrature decoder from PDBG register's QCSV bit fields. Applications can at any point in time retrieve the current state of Phase A and Phase B signals by invoking this API.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: This is applicable only to the quadrature decoder mode of operation.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module
Return direction of revolution of the motor of type XMC_POSIF_QD_DIR_t

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Returns the direction of revolution of the motor. Retrieves direction from QDC register's DVAL bit field in quadrature mode. Applications can at any point in time retrieve the direction of rotation by invoking this API.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: This is applicable only to the quadrature decoder mode of operation.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module
Returns previous state of quadrature decoder[Phase B,Phase A]

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Returns the previous state of phase signals in quadrature decoder mode of peripheral. Retrieves previous state of the quadrature decoder from PDBG register's QPSV bit fields. Applications can at any point in time retrieve the previous state of Phase A and Phase B signals by invoking this API.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: This is applicable only to the quadrature decoder mode of operation.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module
Pointer to quadrature decoder initialization data
Returns quadrature mode initialization status of type XMC_POSIF_STATUS_t

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Initializes quadrature decoder control mode. Configures PCONF register with quadrature mode using XMC_POSIF_QD_MODE_t data structure. Initializes QDC register with quadrature mode configuration using XMC_POSIF_QD_CONFIG_t structure.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: It is necessary to have called XMC_POSIF_Init first with Quadrature decoder mode before invocation of this API.

memberdef.argsstring: (XMC_POSIF_t *const peripheral, const XMC_POSIF_INPUT_PORT_t input0, const XMC_POSIF_INPUT_PORT_t input1, const XMC_POSIF_INPUT_PORT_t input2)
memberdef.name: XMC_POSIF_SelectInputSource

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module
Choice of input for input 0 [0-3]
Choice of input for input 1 [0-3]
Choice of input for input 2 [0-3]

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Configures which input to be connected to POSIF module. Configures PCONF register's INSEL0,INSEL1,INSEL2 bit fields with source for the input connection for input0 input1, input2 respectively.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: Configures which input is used for the Phase X or Hall input X function depending upon the module is set for Quadrature Decoder or Hall Sensor Mode.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module
Event to be manually asserted

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Manually generates event of peripheral. Manually asserts an IRQ generation capable event by configuring 1 to SPFLG register's event bit field.

memberdef.argsstring: (XMC_POSIF_t *const peripheral, const XMC_POSIF_IRQ_EVENT_t event, const XMC_POSIF_SR_ID_t sr)
memberdef.name: XMC_POSIF_SetInterruptNode

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module
Event to be acknowledged of type XMC_POSIF_IRQ_EVENT_t
Service request line of type XMC_POSIF_SR_ID_t

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Configures event to generate sr (service request) of peripheral. Binds an IRQ event to a service request line by configuring PFLGE register's event bit field.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module
POSIF operating mode of type XMC_POSIF_MODE_t

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Configures POSIF module for mode. Configures PCONF register's a\ FSEL bitfield with mode. Refer XMC_POSIF_MODE_t for available options.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: POSIF module should be in stopped state while changing the operating mode.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Starts POSIF peripheral functional state machine. Starts POSIF state machine for peripheral.Configures PRUNS register's SRB bit field with 1.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: Global properties of POSIF along with mode specific properties should have been initialized before starting of POSIF FSM.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_POSIF_Stop(),XMC_POSIF_IsRunning()

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of POSIF module

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Stops POSIF peripheral functional state machine. Stop POSIF functional state machine and clears current internal status of the peripheral. Configures PRUNC register's CRB bit field with 1.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_POSIF_Start(),XMC_POSIF_IsRunning()
